title: 新人求助,死亡不掉落问题
author: lzyxxxx
txt_content:
本帖最后由 lzyxxxx 于 2014-6-17 01:31 编辑 

要怎么调才可以让死亡不掉落插件，pvp时不掉落物品还有为什么死亡不掉落只有op有用其他人都不行？？？？急急急，求大神告诉我

replies.author: LZX6238
replies.txt_content:
lzyxxxx 发表于 2014-6-17 15:03
可是被怪打死和pvp死亡还是会掉啊,怎么办啊
打开服务端里的插件文件里的Scavenger文件夹，里面修改配置文件即可，如何修改详情查看http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?m ... highlight=Scavenger
有写

replies.author: nqcwxp
replies.txt_content:
nqcwxp 发表于 2014-6-17 00:37
直接命令输/gamerule keepInventory ture
输错了，后面应该是true

replies.author: lzyxxxx
replies.txt_content:
nqcwxp 发表于 2014-6-17 00:37
输错了，后面应该是true
这个可以用于服务器么?

replies.author: nqcwxp
replies.txt_content:
lzyxxxx 发表于 2014-6-17 00:47
这个可以用于服务器么?
有权限就可以

replies.author: lzyxxxx
replies.txt_content:
nqcwxp 发表于 2014-6-17 00:48
有权限就可以
不行啊,上面显示NO game rule called keeplnventory is available

replies.txt_content:
lzyxxxx 发表于 2014-6-17 01:13
求教啊,急急急
那你论坛搜索死亡不掉落的插件呗

replies.txt_content:
yr6965801 发表于 2014-6-17 01:16

replies.txt_content:

replies.author: Sonic1997
replies.txt_content:
lzyxxxx 发表于 2014-6-16 08:56
不行啊,上面显示NO game rule called keeplnventory is available
大小写敏感

replies.author: LZX6238
replies.txt_content:
http://www.mcbbs.net/forum.php?mod=viewthread&tid=224208&highlight=Scavenger
这3个是最重要的权限
只要打
/mangaddp builder scavenger.scavenge  启用物品恢复
/mangaddp builder scavenger.level  启用等级恢复
/mangaddp builder scavenger.exp  启用经验值恢复

replies.author: mc008
replies.txt_content: /gamerule keepInventory ture输入这个指令，就可以了
